EASTERN CARIBBEAN SEA.
MARTINIQUE.
DNC 14.
39 FOOT S/V LOLITA, WHITE HULL, THREE PERSONS
ON BOARD, REQUESTING ASSISTANCE. LAST KNOWN
POSITION IN 14-19.60N 062-21.10W AT 121430Z JUL.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
